item.title: Concepts to Understand Reinforcement Learning
item.description: In which I explain what is reinforcement learning, where it fits in the whole as a machine learning paradigm. Some of the basic concepts of reinforcement how they interact with each other and some possible directions. Introduction Reinforcement learining — RL — seems to be the hot topic in machine learning nowadays, it’s the basis for the algorithm that beat the Go champion, a game in which, pundits claim, a computer would not be able to beat a human within this century and also it is what makes you spend more when shopping online.
